title: Market, Theme Park & Cooking! üé¢
summary: I'm planning the perfect mix of local culture and fun! Starting with fresh sushi at Kuromon Market, then unleashing my inner child at Universal Studios Japan. I'm especially excited about the Harry Potter world and learning to make okonomiyaki in the evening!
